metaData.name: Metadata
metaData.help: If not provided, defaults to box size = [100, 100, 100], scale = 1.0, and no metadata about the trajectory or model

displayData.name: Display data
displayData.description: Provide display information for each particle type from Smoldyn
displayData.help: If not provided, defaults to display name from Smoldyn, and draws agent as a sphere with radius = 1.0 and default colors

key_item.name: Particle name
key_item.description: Provide the name of the particle in Smoldyn

value_item.name: Particle display data
value_item.description: Provide information about how to display this particle

timeUnits.name: Time units
timeUnits.help: If not provided, defaults to seconds

spatialUnits.name: Spatial units
spatialUnits.help: If not provided, defaults to meters
